title: Elevators, Stainless Steel Refrigerator, Porches or Balconies
posting_body: ['Evoq Apartments encompasses the best of the Las Vegas Strip all in one convenient, modern, and central location.', 'Enjoy a storied neighborhood, engaging culture, and unique living accommodations in an unbeatable location just a block from the most luxurious Hotels and Casinos in the World.', '-24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', '-Elevators', '-Stainless Steel Multi-Cycle Dishwasher', '-Marbled Tile Bath Enclosures', '-On-Site Courtesy Patrol', '-Well Beats Personal Fitness Classes', '-Hardwood Floors', '-Reduced Sound Assembly Homes', '-Entertainers', 'Clubhouse with TV Area, Modern Community kitchen, Billiards, Baby Grand Piano', '-Vanity', '-Glossy', 'Two Toned Grey / White Flat Panel Cabinetry', '-Business Center with Complimentary WiFi, Computers, and Brainstorming Room', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
